Name: Meat Lead Fire
About the game: Open the temple gates, activate and control destructive weaponry against those who want your ruin. Gut and scorch with lead and fire for the meat tides never stop, until your bastion falls. -Defende yourself against endless onslaughts of monster-bugs. -Manage 4 different types of guns with inherent strength and weakness. -Ejoy tearing apart 5 tiers of enemy, with different death animation for each gun.
